name: Darkness
overview: DARKNESS STORY: While traveling over Africa a plane carrying adventurer Stan and his girl Megan crash lands in the jungle. Upon waking Stan cannot find his girl. Then, from the jungle he hears a scream - his beloved is in trouble! With only a rock as a weapon Stan sets off into the deep, dark Jungle. DARKNESS FEATURES: • Single player arcade action! • 100 screens in one load! • Lush locations to explore! • Atmospheric soundtracks! • Intro + end-sequence! • Bonus mini-game + music demo! • PAL and NTSC compatible
